titles.title: Gunsmith Excise Tax Simplification Act of 2003
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt small manufacturers from the firearms excise tax.
Gunsmith Excise Tax Simplification Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Gunsmith Excise Tax Simplification Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt a person who manufactures, produces, and imports fewer than 50 firearms per year from the firearms excise tax.Treats persons considered as a single employer for certain special rule provisions as a single person for such exemption.
